snippet.title: Bulletstorm VR - Official Update 1.3 Launch Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Bulletstorm VR is a first-person action-adventure shooter developed by Incuvo. Take a look at the latest trailer going over the updates and improvements made to the game with the new Update 1.3 such as increased pixel density, eye foveated rendering, loading screen enhancements, trophy fixes, NPC idle animation, and more. Update 1.3 for Bulletstorm VR is available now for PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2), SteamVR, and Meta Quest with the game coming soon to PICO.
